attributes.COLL_METHOD:
2007-2013:  Using microdata of the American Housing Survey national public use files.  Tabulate ZADEQ (recoded adequacy of housing, values '2' and '3') for occupied units (STATUS='1') in urban areas (METRO3 IN['1','2','4','9']), weighted by WGT90GEO.  Percent of all occupied in urban areas.  See AHS codebook for full description of variables:  http://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/ahs/tech-documentation/codebooks/ahs-codebook.html
2015 and later:  Using internal use file of the American Housing Survey.  Tabulate ADEQUACY (recoded adequacy of housing, values '2' and '3') for occupied units (INTSTATUS='1') in urban areas (URBAN_2010 IN('1','2')).  See online codebook at https://www.census.gov/data-tools/demo/codebook/ahs/ahsdict.html.
attributes.TITLE: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements, or inadequate housing
attributes.UNIT_MEASURE: Percent of all occupied housing units (households)
